Challenged(uint256,address).details: This event indicates that `sendSnapshot(epoch)` should be called in the inbox.

params.epoch: The epoch associated with the challenged claim.

Claimed(address,bytes32).details: Watcher check this event to challenge fraud.

params.stateRoot: The state root of the claim.

MessageRelayed(uint64).details: This event indicates that a message has been relayed.

params.msgId: The msgId of the message that was relayed.

Verified(uint256).details: This events indicates that verification has succeeded. The messages are ready to be relayed.

challenge(uint256,(bytes32,address,uint3.details: Submit a challenge for the claim of the inbox state root snapshot taken at 'epoch'.

params.epoch: The epoch of the claim to challenge.

claim(uint256,bytes32).details: Submit a claim about the _stateRoot at _epoch and submit a deposit.

params._epoch: The epoch for which the claim is made.

params._bridge: The address of the Arbitrum bridge contract on Ethereum.
params._challengePeriod: The duration of the period allowing to challenge a claim.
params._deposit: The deposit amount to submit a claim in wei.
params._epochClaimDelay: The number of epochs a claim can be submitted for.
params._maxMissingBlocks: The maximum number of blocks that can be missing in a challenge period.
params._timeoutEpochs: The epochs before the bridge is considered shutdown.
params._veaInbox: The address of the inbox contract on Arbitrum.

devnetAdvanceState(uint256,bytes32).details: Testnet operator utility function to claim, validate and withdraw.

params.epoch: The epoch for which the claim is made.

returns.testPassed: True if the claim passed the censorship test.

resolveDisputedClaim(uint256,bytes32,(by.details: Resolves any challenge of the optimistic claim for '_epoch'.

params._stateRoot: The true state root for the epoch.
params.claim: The claim associated with the epoch

sendMessage(bytes32[],uint64,address,byt.details: Verifies and relays the message. UNTRUSTED.

params.message: The message encoded with header from VeaInbox.
params.msgId: The zero based index of the message in the inbox.
params.proof: The merkle proof to prove the message.
params.to: The address of the contract on Ethereum to call.

params.epoch: The epoch of the optimistic claim.

withdrawChallengeDeposit(uint256,(bytes3.details: Sends the deposit back to the Challenger if successful. Includes a portion of the Bridger's deposit.

params.claim: The claim associated with the epoch.
params.epoch: The epoch associated with the challenge deposit to withraw.

withdrawChallengerEscapeHatch(uint256,(b.details: When bridge is shutdown, no claim disputes can be resolved. This allows the challenger to withdraw their deposit.

params.claim: The claim associated with the epoch.
params.epoch: The epoch associated with the claim deposit to withraw.

withdrawClaimDeposit(uint256,(bytes32,ad.details: Sends the deposit back to the Bridger if their claim is not successfully challenged. Includes a portion of the Challenger's deposit if unsuccessfully challenged.

params.epoch: The epoch associated with the claim deposit to withraw.

withdrawClaimerEscapeHatch(uint256,(byte.details: When bridge is shutdown, no claim disputes can be resolved. This allows the claimer to withdraw their deposit.

params.claim: The claim associated with the epoch.
params.epoch: The epoch associated with the claim deposit to withraw.

resolveDisputedClaim(uint256,bytes32,(by.notice: Note: Access restricted to arbitrum  bridge.
